Decoy.display_help: The Decoy is an illusion, and is intangible.

Fire_Sword.display_help: The Decoy can summon the illusion of a Fire Sword. Note that Fire Sword is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Moderate

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.

Ice_Sword.display_help: The Decoy can summon the illusion of a Ice Sword. Note that Ice Sword is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Moderate

Punch.display_help: A Super Strength Punch is a powerful pummeling attack, and may knock foes off their feet. Note that Punch is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Moderate

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.

Hurl.display_help: The Decoy can pick up and throw nearby objects, or even a piece of concrete flooring. Can knock foes back. Note that Hurl is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Slow

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.

Power_Bolt.display_help: A quick attack. Rapidly hurls small bolts of energy at foes, sometimes knocking them down. Note that Power Bolt is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Fast

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.

Fire_Blast.display_help: Sends a Blast of Fire at a targeted foe, setting them on fire for a short time. Slower recharge rate than Flares, but more damage. Note that Fire Blast is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Fast

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.

Ice_Blast.display_help: Ice Blast hurls shards of ice at foes and Slows their attacks for a time. Slower recharge than Ice Bolt, but more damage. Note that Ice Blast is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Fast
Ice_Blast.display_target_help: Your attack rate has been reduced.

Lightning_Bolt.display_help: The Decoy can send a large blast of electrical energy at a foe. Note that Lightning Bolt is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Fast
